kb3.name: kb3_comments
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_comments` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `site` char(16) DEFAULT NULL, `kll_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `comment` text NOT NULL, `name` tinytext NOT NULL, `posttime` timestamp NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `ip` varbinary(39) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0:0:0:0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `kll_site_id` (`kll_id`,`site`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
